DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Brief Wisconsin Inventory of Smoking Dependence Motive (Brief WISDM) Questionnaire Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion._Of short duration, extent, or distance._A state in the northern midwest United States. Its capital is Madison._The goods and materials held by a business._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._The psychological or physiological need to take a substance in oder to experience its effects or to avoid the effects of its absence._The psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion.

Concepts.definition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties.

Property.preferredName: Brief Wisconsin Inventory Smoking Dependence Motivation Questionnaire
Property.preferredDefinition: Of short duration, extent, or distance.:A state in the northern midwest United States. Its capital is Madison.:The goods and materials held by a business.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:The psychological or physiological need to take a substance in oder to experience its effects or to avoid the effects of its absence.:The psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: Of short duration, extent, or distance.
A state in the northern midwest United States. Its capital is Madison.
A list of goods and materials, or those goods and materials themselves, held available for use by a business.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
The psychological or physiological need to take a substance in order to experience its effects or to avoid the effects of its absence.
The psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.
